subject: Basketball (College)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: P. J. Hairston’s career at North Carolina ended under the cloud of an N.C.A.A. investigation, but he was signed in January by the Texas Legends of the N.B.A. Development League.
snippet: P. J. Hairston’s career at North Carolina ended under the cloud of an N.C.A.A. investigation, but he was signed in January by the Texas Legends of the N.B.A. Development League.
